content:
Each Rick Riordan series is unique and interesting in its own way, and the mythology they explore is equally fascinating. If you enjoyed the Percy Jackson series, I would recommend reading the other series he has written that are based on Greek and Roman mythology, such as:

1. The Heroes of Olympus series - This series is a sequel to the Percy Jackson and the Olympians series and follows a new group of demigods as they embark on a quest to save the world from Gaea, the earth goddess.

2. The Trials of Apollo series - This series follows the god Apollo, who has been turned into a mortal teenager by Zeus as punishment for his part in the war between Greek and Roman demigods.

If you want to explore different mythologies, I would recommend checking out the Kane Chronicles (based on Egyptian mythology) or the Magnus Chase and the Gods of Asgard series (based on Norse mythology). Ultimately, the choice is up to you and what interests you the most!
